attributes.action: Make only Tax payers eligble to vote.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should only let Tax payers vote since they are the only ones who are putting money into this country however i think there should be certain exclusions like to people who cannot work i.e. disabled and pensioners. I think anyone who does not pay income tax should have to pay to vote since they have put nothing into the country why should they get anything out of it?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
